results.content: Covers most of the basics on HTML5 & CSS
results.content_html: Covers most of the basics on HTML5 & CSS

results.content: This is a fully comprehensive beginners course on HTML5 and CSS3. The author is clear and breaks down the concepts in a way where someone without technical skills can understand. Each of the lessons flow one into the other building on each as a foundation. I highly recommend this course to anyone who is a beginner or someone looking to refresh their existing skills.
results.content_html: This is a fully comprehensive beginners course on HTML5 and CSS3. The author is clear and breaks down the concepts in a way where someone without technical skills can understand. Each of the lessons flow one into the other building on each as a foundation. I highly recommend this course to anyone who is a beginner or someone looking to refresh their existing skills.
